  trailingComma: 'all',
  singleQuote: true,
  plugins: [
    'prettier-plugin-tailwindcss',
    '@trivago/prettier-plugin-sort-imports',
  ],
  importOrder: [
    'react', // React
    '^react-.*$', // React-related imports
    '^next', // Next-related imports
    '^next-.*$', // Next-related imports
    '^next/.*$', // Next-related imports
    '^.*/hooks/.*$', // Hooks
    '^.*/services/.*$', // Services
    '^.*/utils/.*$', // Utils
    '^.*/types/.*$', // Types
    '^.*/pages/.*$', // Components
    '^.*/components/.*$', // Components
    '^[./]', // Other imports
    '.*', // Any uncaught imports
  ],
  importOrderSeparation: true,
  importOrderSortSpecifiers: true,
};

<T>({ initialState }: { initialState: T }) => {
  type Action =
    | { type: 'reset' }
    | { type?: 'change'; field: FieldNames<T>; value: any };

  const reducer = (state: T, action: Action) => {
    if (!action.type) return { ...state, [action.field]: action.value };

    if (action.type === 'reset') return initialState;

    throw new Error();
  };

  const [state, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, initialState);

  return useMemo(() => ({ state, dispatch }), [state, dispatch]);
}
